source.0bb616c3: #### multi  Box plot with a catatory and quantitative spread wrt each class
source.b39d1225: Hue is to add one more catagorical feature in the x axis,
source.b76d4366:
Bar chart need two features ,X axis is catagory , and y axis is a quantitative.
it will sum the quantitative feature wrt each category and shown wrt ratio.
If it is a catagorical label encoded with number, then the sum of all the labels will come 
ie in titanic if y is survived it will add the 0s and 1s, so effectively we will ge the ratio of 
survived between the class in the catagory feature in x

source.199d7e78:
In boxplot it will taker a quantitatie feature and plot with median(50percentile), 
75 percentile/25percentile.
If we add a catagorical feature then it will give that quantitative feature spread wrt each class
in that catagorical feature
source.93bb1af6:
If we are ploting a catagorical against a Quantitative data , it will give the mean of that quantitative
wrt each class in that catagorical feature
Here we have catagory of Exterist and Sales is the Quatitative.so we will get the avg sales price
for each catagory class
